title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), it was observed that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. However, the scrollbars do not have any effect. Even when opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only). 
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. 
3. Attempt to use the scrollbars and notice that they do not have any effect. 
4. Open a small image, like an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
